ðŸ“– Summary: This repository hosts materials for an open Machine Learning course, including lecture recordings, slides, and homework assignments. It covers a range of topics from introductory concepts like Naive Bayes and kNN to more advanced topics like Deep Learning and Gradient Boosting. The course provides a structured learning path with deadlines for assignments.
